full_summary:
### NDP: W6844-22M020-2 Inspection, Maintenance and Repair Services for Breathing Air Systems and Compressors

#### Solicitation Title
Inspection, maintenance, and repair services for breathing air systems and compressors for the Department of National Defence (DND).

#### Solicitation Information

*   Solicitation Number: WS3823186939
*   Publication Date: March 21, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date and Time: April 24, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
*   Amendment Number: 3
*   Amendment Date: April 21, 2023
*   Expiration Date: The tender has expired.

#### Procurement Information

*   Procurement Category: Service (SRV)
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
*   Type of Procurement: Request for Proposal
*   Expected Contract Start Date: June 13, 2023
*   Expected Contract End Date: June 12, 2024

#### Purchase Requirements

*   Purchase Description: PWGSC, on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the maintenance of breathing air systems located in Montral and Saint-Hubert (Québec, Canada), as detailed in Annex A.
*   All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2 PM EDT on [TBD]. Bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will be declared non-responsive.

#### Trade Agreements
*   Trade Agreements: None

#### Attachment
*   No attachments available.

#### Notice URL
*   Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15763381?extsite=MTU3NjMzODFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Contact Information

*   Point of Contact: Adina Ayassou (she/her)
*   Email: <adina.ayassou@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca> 
*   Contact: Department of National Defence (DND)
*   Address: 101 Colonel By Dr 
*   City: Ottawa
*   Province: Ontario
*   Postal Code: K1A 0K2
*   Country: Canada
